verses.name: Ezekiel 37:4
verses.text: Again he said unto me, Prophesy upon these bones, and say unto them, O ye dry bones, hear the word of the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:5
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God unto these bones; Behold, I will cause breath to enter into you, and ye shall live:

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:6
verses.text: And I will lay sinews upon you, and will bring up flesh upon you, and cover you with skin, and put breath in you, and ye shall live; and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
